title: Slack Agile Coach
notes: - Implemented a **javascript** Slack chatbot that connects to Github, Zenhub, and Watson Assistant Service through **REST API** to perform all native github, zenhub, and publish operations via slack. (eg. create issues, assign story points and change milestone, etc.)
- Designed a caching system cooperating with the database to ensure the chatbot can execute 99% of requests in 0.3s.

- The Coach chatbot could increase efficiency on planing, monitoring, and managing the **agile development** process by 300%+. (Engineers and managers could accomplish all agile developing actions without leaving slack)

title: Video Game Action Recognition with Transfer Learning
notes: - Designed a system using **deep learning** and **transfer learning** for accurate and quick **video game action recognition** in multiple domains.

- The model is trained on UCF101 dataset and transferred to other games with a relatively much smaller dataset. Comparing to direct train on smaller dataset, our system has 20x faster training speed and 17% more predicting accuracy.
- For future work we intend to explore the possibility of stylistically altering these realistic datasets to particular game aesthetics.

title: Video-to-Log Generator
notes: - Designed a system using **CNN** model to transcribe game video to log; aiming to provide a quick and precise prediction of how a player performs by onlyusing gameplay videos.
- Referenced to AlexNet, I implemented modified last layer of the model to perform well on regional feature capture and multi-class classification.
- The system is tested on Mario Bro games with 86% accuracy in only 1 training iteration.

title: Picture Super Resolution
notes: - Improved a model using efficient sub-pixel convolution layer for increasing spatial resolution within network for tasks.
- Aiming to restore details of pictures after low-quality compression fast and efficient.
- Developed on PyTorch and deployed to web app and mobile app using Caffe2. Since Pytorch and Caffe2 are going to merge together, the project might be refactored.

title: MARTA System Database - Georgia Tech SLS program
notes: - Designed a customized database schema and controlling system for MARTA system
- Implemented schema on the MySQL platform to efficiently perform trip taking, trip ending, managing cards, and more administrative features.
- Used Flask as front-end framework to construct an easy using UI

title: Automated Note Generator
notes: - Designed an Android App to transcribe photos that students took from lectures or audio recordings of notes in Word Documents automatically to help students to study.
- Deeply modified an OCR model for picture recognition and a language processing model for audio recognition application and deployed them on the Android platform

title: Lost-N-Found Android App
notes: - Designed a Lost-N-Found Android application for campus service
- Fully integrated database, animation, and Google maps into my Android application
- Developed a secure and efficient user system by using built-in Firebase
